attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are concerned that this man is allegedly still trading in equines and is regularly seen at horse sales and markets.  We ask that he receives maximum sentences for his crimes and that he or his family members are not allowed to keep animals in the future.

rejection.details: Individual sentencing is a matter for the courts, who are independent of Government.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
